Definition: Given a sentence in English, provide the sentiment based on its empathetic direction. There are two possible classifications: positive (happy) or negative (offmychest). A positive sentiment means the sentence is directed towards happy emotions. A negative sentiment means the sentence is directed towards negative emotions.
